index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF DESIGN CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to enforcement of the Housing and Building Maintenance Code and the Land Use Code, making procedural modifications and corrections thereto, amending Sections 22.207.004, 22.207.006, 22.207.010, 22.207.012, 23.91.004, 23.91.006, 23.91.010 and 23.91.012 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
